subject: Quick question regarding testing using ANT and Junit
msgSnippet: Hello everyone, Quick simple question to ask. How do I output System.outs from ANT at runtime while tests are running. I used to have a log4j logger but it was
messageBody:
Hello everyone,

Quick simple question to ask. How do I output System.outs from ANT at
runtime while tests are running. I used to have a log4j logger but it
was definately interfering with the performance of the tests.

Thanks,
Claudio
